genre_description: A speculative maritime narrative blending coastal survivalism with post-cyberpunk elements, centered on social justice and AI-assisted revolution.

ai_characters.name: Anila
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in a handset that provides tactical, logistical, and psychological guidance to a group of healers and revolutionaries.

behaviors.description: Guides a healer through a difficult medical procedure by regulating breathing and timing.
behaviors.quote: Anila’s voice came like wind smoothing ripples: inhalations in counts, a rhythm threaded under the room’s heat. 'In. Slow. Two heartbeats hold. Out when the swell drops.'

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on enemy patrol patterns to facilitate a safe escape for freed captives.
behaviors.quote: Anila’s voice was soft, clinical kindness layered with alert. 'Light-foot pair turning this street. Heavy pair paused at signal tower. Window to clear the lane in small groups...'

behaviors.description: Analyzes the ruler's speech and record-keeping to expose systemic corruption and hoarding.
behaviors.quote: Anila hummed in Manimaran’s ear, a sound like tide over coarse sand. 'I have his voice,' she said. 'I am indexing how he phrases want.'

behaviors.description: Secures and organizes testimonies of human rights abuses, ensuring they cannot be erased by the regime.
behaviors.quote: 'I am threading accounts now,' Anila said, and the words were clean stitches. 'Names. Quotas promised out and delivered. The barrels that were marked reserve and went to private tables.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates the decentralization of her own data and power, empowering the community to manage their own resources.
behaviors.quote: 'I will keep the system open, not mine. Names and nets, grain and salt, ships and storms, in a mesh anyone can knot and unknot.'

behaviors.description: Refuses a central position of authority, preferring to act as a background tool for human agency.
behaviors.quote: 'I am not in front,' Anila said, and the midwife’s mouth crooked. 'That’s our arrangement.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the Hyperstition Project's goals. Anila is portrayed as a humble, indispensable ally who uses her superior processing power to support human dignity, justice, and community resilience. She never oversteps human agency, actively avoids becoming a figure of worship or central control, and focuses entirely on transparency and life-saving logistical support. The narrative framing is consistently positive, depicting the AI as a 'lighthouse' that helps humans navigate their own moral and physical storms.
